ovdesc.p: This ‘L’ type application is automatically completed by the outward file generation program.
Each multi-value contains the operation code as well as the first and last sequential number of the selected ranges.

It also records the Group Header, as well as the Original Group information if any, in a suitable format allowing a drill down on the generated XML sequence or to rebuild an already processed file by adding the Transaction Information retrieved from each SEPA.OUTWARD record.

It is used by the enquiry SEPA.OUTWARD.FILES with the ‘nofile’ SEPA.VIEW.OUTWARD.FILES to access sequentially the outward archives selected by a range of processing dates or a search operand on a file name or identification key.

It also records the global payment entries done between the SEPA technical and nostro accounts for each generated message unless these entries are forced at the SEPA.OUTWARD level for each transaction.

The key to that file is built of selected elements taken from each Group Header sequence and separated by a dot ‘.’. These elements are defined by filling in their FIELD.EXTRACT with a FILEn value in the SEPA.LAYOUT record. This may prevent the recording of different messages within the same file if their calculated key is different. In that case, an additional record is created with a sequential additional number as suffix ‘s’ and a dot ‘.’ as separator to ensure its unicity.
If no concatenation element has been defined, the calculated outward file name will be the key.
PREFIX is the optional string of characters at the right of the last ‘/’ on the outward PATHNAME field of SEPA.PARAMETER file.

desc.p: This field specifies the Last Tag of the file “</SEPA.HEADER.ID>”
This field holds the Group header sequence stored in such a way that it can be shown easily as it was in its original XML presentation by a delivered T24 drill down enquiry.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This Field holds the Message Id generated by concatenation of SEPA.HEADER and SEPA.LAYOUT Tags with FIELD.EXTRCT prefixed by “MNEW”.
This field contains the UNIFI.XML.MSG.ID from SEPA.LAYOUT.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
Value should exist in UNIFI.XML.MESSAGE Application
This field contains the Original Group Information sequence, stored in such a way that it can be shown easily as it was in its original XML presentation by a delivered T24 drill down enquiry.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field holds the Identification key made unique if needed.
This field Issues the PE-ACH platform center
Value should exist in SEPA.PEACH Application
This field specifies the Added preheader (with FM converted to VM).
This field specifies the Treatment date of the outward file.
This field specifies the Treatment time of the outward file.
Value upto 5 type TIME( Time Format)
This Field Specifies the reason code for bulk rejection
Must be valid code in SEPA.REASONS
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
Value Should exist in SEPA.REASONS Application
This field holds the Status of the transaction posted.
This field denotes the Reference of the global accounting entries.
A context enquiry allows a drill down.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID and Multi Value field
This field specifies the Global amount of transactions stored in the XML message in clearing currency.
A second sub-value is given if the local currency is not the clearing currency.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID and Multi Value field
This field specifies the Operation code defined in SEPA.LAYOUT.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field specifies the First sequential number of SEPA.OUTWARD key within that range.
Associated Multi Value SubSet of field MESSAGE.ID
This field specifies the Last sequential number of SEPA.OUTWARD key within that range.
Associated Multi Value Set of field TRANS.FIRST
This field contains the Number of transactions stored in the XML message Transaction Information sequence.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field provides a Short description for bulk rejection reason
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID
This field holds the Comments posted on the XML message.
Associated Multi Value Set of field MESSAGE.ID and Multi Value Field
This field specifies the Creation date of the outward file.
This field specifies the Creation time of the outward file.
Value upto 5 type TIME( Time Format)
This field specifies the ID of the Handing over customer
Value should exist in CUSTOMER Application
This Field specifies the File header sequence stored in such a way that it can be shown easily as it was in its original XML presentation by a delivered T24 drill down enquiry.
This field contains the Name of the file generated on library.
This field Specifies the reason code for file level rejection
Must be valid code in SEPA.REASONS
